content: AMSTERDAM  March 8 Dutch power grid operator TenneT said on Wednesday it had found the first partner for its plan to create an offshore energy hub in the North Sea  Danish power transmission company Energinet.dk.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Dutch  Danish grid operators to form offshore power hub in North Sea

content: CALGARY  Alberta  Feb 28 Canada's oil-rich province of Alberta has fined a local subsidiary of U.S.-based Murphy Oil Corp C$172 500 ($130 031) for its role in a 9 000-barrel spill in 2015 that went undetected for more than six weeks  the provincial energy regulator said on Tuesday.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Canada's Alberta fines Murphy Oil for role in 2015 spill

name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: BRIEF-Pzena Investment Management reports 5 pct passive stake in Murphy Oil - SEC filing

content: LONDON North Sea-focused Premier Oil   which has struggled to contain its $2.8 billion debt pile  has agreed further terms with lenders to stretch out repayment of its debt after months of wrangling.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UK's Premier Oil agrees debt restructuring deal after months of wrangling

content: LONDON Britain has cut rental fees by up to 90 percent in its latest tender for oil and gas licenses in the North Sea launched on Wednesday in a bid to attract companies to find new fields in the mature basin.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Britain offers new oil and gas licenses amid exploration drought

content: LONDON  July 27 Britain has cut rental fees by up to 90 percent in its latest tender for oil and gas licences in the North Sea launched on Wednesday in a bid to attract companies to find new fields in the mature basin.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Britain offers new oil and gas licences amid exploration drought

content: CALGARY  Alberta  April 28 Suncor Energy   Canada's largest oil and gas producer  said on Thursday it will focus on improving efficiency but not seek operatorship at Syncrude oil sands project in northern Alberta  in which it is acquiring a majority stake.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Suncor says will not seek operatorship of Syncrude oil sands plant

content: Canadian oil and gas producer Suncor Energy Inc said on Wednesday it has agreed to pay about C$937 million to acquire an additional 5 percent stake in its Syncrude oil sands joint venture from Murphy Oil Corp's Canadian unit.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Suncor Energy to acquire additional 5 percent stake in Syncrude

content: April 27 Canadian oil and gas producer Suncor Energy Inc said on Wednesday it has agreed to pay about C$937 million to acquire an additional 5 percent stake in its Syncrude oil sands joint venture from Murphy Oil Corp's  Canadian unit.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Suncor Energy to acquire additional 5 pct stake in Syncrude

content: Jan 27 Canada's largest pipeline company Enbridge Inc said it would buy Murphy Oil Corp's  Tupper Main and Tupper West gas plants in northeastern British Columbia for C$538 million.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Enbridge to buy some Murphy Oil gas plants in British Columbia

content: Jan 27 Enbridge Inc  Canada's largest pipeline company  said it would buy Murphy Oil Corp's  Tupper Main and Tupper West gas plants in northeastern British Columbia for C$538 million  ($382 million).
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Enbridge to buy some Murphy Oil gas plants in British Columbia

content: Ineos [INEOSE.UL]  owner of Scotland's Grangemouth petrodoil refinery  has struck a deal with subsidiaries of ExxonMobil and Shell to supply ethane derived from U.S. shale gas which it is to import into Scotland to their nearby chemical plant  the company said on Monday.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Ineos signs U.S. shale gas ethane deal with Exxon  Shell in Scotland

content: French oil major Total  is in talks to sell its gas pipeline in the UK's North Sea to ArcLight Capital partners  a U.S.-based private equity firm focused on energy infrastructure  Bloomberg reported citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Total in talks to sell UK pipeline to U.S. buyout group ArcLight: Bloomberg

content: June 25 French oil major Total is in talks to sell its gas pipeline in the UK's North Sea to ArcLight Capital partners  a U.S.-based private equity firm focused on energy infrastructure  Bloomberg reported citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Total in talks to sell UK pipeline to U.S. buyout group ArcLight -Bloomberg

content: LONDON  May 15 High-profile oil and gas executives are teaming up with private equity funds seeking to invest billions in British North Sea assets and maximize profits by cutting costs  offering the ageing basin a badly needed lifeline.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Top oil execs  cash-rich funds team up to buy UK North Sea assets

content: * LetterOne given six months to sell assets   (Adds LetterOne reaction  background)
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Britain orders sale of Russian billionaire Fridman's North Sea fields

content: LONDON  March 18 The British government is still considering Russian billionaire Mikhail Fridman's acquisition of North Sea gas fields  but has made clear it has the power to require him to sell the assets  Prime Minister David Cameron's spokesman said on Wednesday.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UK still mulling Russian tycoon's N. Sea deal  has power to force sale

content: LONDON  March 11 Russian billionaire Mikhail Fridman's LetterOne fund said it had submitted detailed information to the British government as it tries to salvage a deal to buy North Sea assets from Germany's RWE and avoid a legal clash.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Russian oligarch steps up efforts to salvage North Sea deal

content: LONDON  March 5 Britain is ready to force the sale of Russian oligarch Mikhail Fridman's recently acquired North Sea energy assets unless it receives unspecified assurances within the next week  Prime Minister David Cameron's spokesman said on Thursday.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Britain ready to force sale of oligarch Fridman's N.Sea assets -PM spokesman

content: OSLO  Feb 24 Norwegian engineering firm Aibel has won a contract worth 8 billion crowns ($1.05 billion) from Statoil to build a drilling platform for the Johan Sverdrup field  one of the biggest deals for the giant North Sea field.
name: Murphy Oil Corporation
title: Norway's Aibel wins $1.05 bln Statoil contract for Sverdrup platform
